home.title: Official Website | Lineage II
home.description: Lineage II brings you into an expansive free-to-play MMORPG experience where you create your own destiny in the realm of Aden.

about.title: About The Game | Lineage II
about.description: Welcome to Lineage II, a free-to-play MMORPG where you engage in colossal PvP siege battles, join epic raid encounters and build your own clan of allies.

news.title: Official News | Lineage II
news.description: Get the latest official news for Lineage II, the free-to-play MMORPG where you engage in colossal PvP siege battles, join epic raid encounters and build your own clan of allies.

racesHuman.title: Races and Classes | Lineage II
racesHuman.description: Shape your journey in Lineage II by creating a unique avatar from a selection of 7 unique races leading you to a path of more than 30 potential classes you can evolve into.

races.title: Races and Classes | Lineage II
races.description: Shape your journey in Lineage II by creating a unique avatar from a selection of 7 unique races leading you to a path of more than 30 potential classes you can evolve into.

shopOverview.title: Galleria | Lineage II
shopOverview.description: Sign up for a Prestige Pack subscription, recharge your NCoin balance or send your character to a new adventure on a new server.

prestige.title: Prestige Pack | Lineage II
prestige.description: Subscribe to the Lineage II Prestige Pack and receive exclusive items and great bonuses for both PvE and PvP.

ncoin.title: NCoin | Lineage II
ncoin.description: NCoin is the virtual currency used to buy your favorite items in the L2 Store.

freetoplay.title: Play For Free | Lineage II
freetoplay.description: Create an NCSOFT Account and play Lineage II for FREE

classic.title: Lineage II Classic
classic.description: Enter the classic world of Lineage II and rediscover the magic of how it all began.
